productDetail: The Insalsa Fryer Fry-Light 1400W is a compact and efficient air fryer designed for healthy cooking with minimal oilIt features a powerful 1400W motor for quick and even frying, grilling, and baking. Its sleek design and intuitive controls make it perfect for modern kitchens.

The OnePlus Bullets Z2 Bluetooth Wireless earphones deliver immersive sound with dynamic bass and a long battery life of up to 30 hours. Featuring fast charging, just 10 minutes of charge provides 20 hours of playback. With a lightweight design and IP55 water resistance, they're perfect for everyday use.

productName: New Fastrack Reflex Play| AMOLED display
productDetail: The Fastrack Reflex Play smartwatch features a vibrant AMOLED display for clear and vivid visuals. It offers multiple health tracking features, including heart rate monitoring and sleep tracking, along with built-in games. With stylish looks and seamless connectivity, it’s perfect for tech-savvy users.

The Apple iPhone 13 (128GB) in Green features a sleek design and a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display for stunning visuals. Powered by the A15 Bionic chip, it delivers exceptional performance and energy efficiency. Its advanced dual-camera system ensures brilliant photos and videos, even in low light.

productName: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8+ - Wifi only, Graphite
productDetail: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S8+ (WiFi Only) in Graphite boasts a 12.4-inch Super AMOLED display for immersive visuals and smooth 120Hz refresh rate. Powered by a Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor, it offers seamless multitasking and performance. With S Pen support and a premium design, it's perfect for productivity and entertainment.

The Kodak Mini Shot 3 Retro in Yellow is a stylish instant camera with built-in Bluetooth connectivity for printing photos directly from your smartphone. It supports 3x3-inch photo prints with vibrant colors and sharp details. Compact and fun, it's perfect for capturing and sharing memories on the go.

The Zebronics Zeb-Reaper is a 2.5GHz wireless gaming mouse designed for precision and performance. It features an ergonomic design, adjustable DPI settings, and a responsive sensor for seamless gaming. With RGB lighting and a long-lasting battery, it enhances both style and functionality.

productName: Zebronics Zeb-Transformation-k USB Gaming Keyboard |RGB LED lighting
productDetail: The Zebronics Zeb-Transformer-K USB Gaming Keyboard features robust build quality with RGB LED lighting for an immersive gaming experience. It offers tactile keys for precise control and dedicated multimedia keys for convenience. With a stylish design and durable construction, it's perfect for gamers.

productName: TP-Link Powered USB Hub With 7 Data Smart Changing hub
productDetail: The TP-Link Powered USB Hub with 7 Data Smart Charging Ports combines high-speed data transfer and efficient charging in one device. It supports up to 7 devices simultaneously, offering smart charging for optimized performance. With its compact and durable design, it's perfect for home or office use.

productName: Scarters Mouse Pad, Deskmat Extended for Work from Home/Office/Gaming
productDetail: The Scarters Extended Mouse Pad and Deskmat is designed for work, gaming, or office setups, offering a smooth and spacious surface. Its anti-slip base ensures stability, while the water-resistant material enhances durability. With a sleek design, it adds style and functionality to any workspace.

The HyperX Streamer Starter Pack (HBNDL0001) includes essential gear for aspiring streamers, featuring a high-quality microphone, adjustable boom arm, and pop filter. The pack offers professional-grade sound for clear, crisp audio during streams or recordings. With its sleek black design, it's ideal for creating a polished streaming setup.
